title: Turkey Current Account
description: Turkey recorded a Current Account deficit of 2966 USD Million in September of 2022. Current Account in Turkey averaged -1371.68 USD Million from 1984 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 4101 USD Million in October of 2021 and a record low of -9407 USD Million in March of 2011. Current Account is the sum of the balance of trade (exports minus imports of goods and services), net factor income (such as interest and dividends) and net transfer payments (such as foreign aid). This page provides - Turkey Current Account - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey
